description:
This course is dedicated to every piano student that wants to improve his playing

Do you want to be able to learn scales and arpeggios in all major keys?

Are you struggling with your piano technique?

Join this course and play all major and arpegios following the correct fingering and keeping a good technique.

Through one hundred percent practical videos you will be guided to improve your technical skills.

Follow the one month plan that is suggested in this course and achieve this important piano goal.

This course has downloadable material and can be watched offline through the udemy app in any mobile device.

Join today and start improving your piano playing!!
title: Playing Piano: Major Scales and Arpeggios Vol.I
